You're a hacker with full freedom to act as you want on a vast network of computers procedurally created.

name: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou Vol. 2: Hansel to Gretel
summary: The game relies heavily on the then new full motion video feature of the 3DO. The game is a compilation of cartoons, all loosely based upon stories made famous by the Brothers Grimm. The animation for the cartoons was done by the famous Nippon Anime Corporation.

name: Groob
summary: Embark on a challenging roguelike adventure, mastering tactical deck-building and intricate strategies as you explore unknown dungeons. Build your powerful deck, adapt to changing enemies, and utilize cards and items for victory.

name: Gravity Machine
summary: Venture into the depths of the Gravity Machine and test your sliding skills in this 5-star Mario 64 hack! Made for Simpleflips' Slide Hack Competition (2024)

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 4
summary: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from Vocaloid! Includes a VTuber cover song!

name: Grid Pix Advent
summary: Festive edition of the game Grid Pix, with 24 nonogram puzzles to solve.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Krasnaya Polyana 1943
summary: Occupy positions in the Krasnaya Polyana village and break out of the encirclement in the area of Zmiyev en route to Kharkov.

name: Graceful Danmaku Festival
summary: Graceful Danmaku Festival is a free bullet hell game developed by Princess Sylvysprit. Itsuna Nani, the game's protagonist, sets out to solve the mystery as to why she is being attacked by gun-wielding fairies.

name: Growers
summary: Growers is a chaotic platformer multiplayer PvP game in which players compete with each other to reach the light on a dark map, to transform into a monster and devour the others. Be the last standing to win!

name: Grimm: Episode 5 - The Girl Without Hands
summary: Grimm episode 5 - The Girl Without Hands

name: Ground Breakers
summary: Battle with robots on dynamic, randomly generated battlegrounds, as you attempt to take on the world in this unique turn-based strategy game.

name: Grab Them by the Eyes
summary: As a street vendor, players attempt to outsell the competition by creating progressively more garish signage.

name: Grey
summary:
Grey is a total conversion Half-Life 2 horror modification where the player must solve puzzles, fight to survive, and find out what is happening to the world around you. We have made a lot changes to the base Source engine and have added countless new mechanics in the mod such as the objective indicator, portable medkit, donator based extras, pickup animations, failed reloads, new picture based GUI elements and much, much more!

To those who survive the horror the first time around we have an extra ‘hardcore mode’ which gives an even greater challenge to the player. This hardcore mode is not only just about more enemy hitpoints and higher damage.

For the hardcore mode we have changed the maps and puzzles, as well as having extra enemies (including ones unique to hardcore mode), new chilling places and situations, and of course a new ending to go with it.

name: Grow Nano 3
summary: Heal the little blue man by picking the objects in order

name: Gridiron!
summary:
Gridiron! is a sports video game developed by Bethesda Softworks and published by Electronic Arts in 1986. The project was led by Bethesda founder Christopher Weaver and lead programmer Ed Fletcher. Their objective was to create a sports simulation game with a physics-based engine. The game was developed on a low budget, with the development team creating the necessary tools and engine themselves.

Electronic Arts handled the marketing and distribution of Gridiron! as part of an agreement for Bethesda to develop a licensed John Madden football game. In 1988, Bethesda filed a $7.3 million lawsuit against Electronic Arts, claiming that EA had ceased distribution of Gridiron! to incorporate its features into their Madden title. The lawsuit was ultimately settled out of court. By 1989, Gridiron! had sold nearly 20,000 units. The game was also included in Amiga World's list of the "40 Best Games of All Time."

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 1
Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 1
summary: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from Vocaloid! Includes a VTuber cover song!

name: Greatest Nine '96
summary: Greatest Nine '96, is a Sega Saturn sequel to Kanzen Chuukei Pro Yakyuu Greatest Nine.

name: Greedy Bubble
summary: A brutally difficult arcade game about a cute and greedy bubble that's trapped inside a cave. Can you guide it out while collecting as many coins as you can?

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Touhou Project Arrangements Pack 2
Grief: How to say goodbye
summary: The game branches the issues of loosing a loved one.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 5
summary: A new pack featuring 10 Vocaloid songs, navigators, and avatars!

name: Great Battle!! Tezuka All Stars
summary: Card battle game featuring Osamu Tezuka characters.

name: Grit Under the Eyelid
summary: Grit Under the Eyelid is recycledoj's first solo release for Quake, for Arcane Dimensions 1.8 Patch 1. This is primarily single player focused, and makes some pretty extensive use of the jump boots for exploration, and includes a lot of platforming as a result.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Original Pack 3
Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Original Pack 4: 10th Anniversary
Gray
summary: "Gray" is a first person, survival horror set around a Lunar prison colony, with a focus on story telling. Your oxygen is depleting as your mind is breaking. Can you smell the burning?

name: Granbo
summary: Granbo is a RPG game released for the Game Boy Advance in 2001. It was only released in Japan. The game's story focus on a young boy named Kakeru trying to save the world through the use of robotic animals. Granbo was also released for Nintendo's Virtual Console for Wii U in Japan.

name: Grayscale
summary: Grayscale is a story driven, 2D puzzle platformer centered around the main character Faela. The game follows her story as she attempts to save her world from its own instability. Take advantage of the bizarre plane swapping physics of their world to change everything around you and progress.

name: Gray Tank
summary: Gray Tank is a classic 2D action game. You are a tank commander and thrilling missions are waiting to be completed by you.

name: Gravity Angels Part 1: Alien Discovery
summary:
Gravity Angels Part 1: Alien Discovery is one game in a series of Multipath Movies(TM) by Brilliant Digital Entertainment. These games are pure interactive movies that display a movie that allows for the player to select among multiple paths at opportune junctures of the storyline. In that way, the game is a "choose your own adventure" movie. Unlike other games of the interactive movie genre, which generally display the movie bits using pre-rendered full motion video, this game renders 3D models of the movie in real time.

The science fiction story of this movie/game follows a group of employees of the interplanetary mining corporation Miller-Western. For a variety of disciplinary reasons, the employees are sent to the Jupiter moon of Ganymede which used to have a thriving osmium-mining operation but is now just a dumping ground for problematic employees who assault their bosses or engineer faulty equipment because they were drunk. No one on the base is to be trusted, everyone is hiding a bevy of secrets and to make matters worse, every monitor across the moon base periodically picks up mysterious transmissions that appear to depict some unknown alien lifeform. Who are they? What do they want? Hence, the subtitle of the game, Alien Discovery.

name: Grove
summary: A 1-level wad for Doom II created by Bernard "B.P.R.D" de Windt, Grove was one of the winners of the 2004 Cacowards and placed 97th in Doomworld's "Top 100 Most Memorable Maps," receiving recognition for its puzzles and atmosphere.

name: GroundZero
summary: GroundZero is an FPS - First Person Shooter Multiplayer that tells the saga of two antagonistic forces. Game story, skins system, season passes and a new game mode for up to 80 players. Grab your weapons, join your friends and reach the top.

name: Granite Casket
summary: Granite Casket is a claustrophobic horror about crawling with six degrees of freedom through caverns. Careful positioning and awkward angles will be needed to find the crevices within the earth no human was ever designed to go.

name: Grand Gardens
summary: Grand Gardens, an enchanting 3D Walking/Exploring simulator that invites you to immerse yourself in the serene beauty of an ancient and sacred Japanese garden.

name: Great 1000 Miles Rally: Evolution Model!!!
summary: This is the minor version up of the original Great 1000 Mile Rally featuring additional vehicles.

name: Graywood: Noir Detective
summary: GRAYWOOD is an unforgiving detective game that makes you think and feel like a real detective. Gather evidence, interrogate suspects, and make connections to craft your own lines of questioning in up to 14 cases. Follow your moral compass, or respect the law. The choice is yours.

name: Gratia
summary: A narritive RPG about gratitude!

name: Grim Tales: The Final Suspect Collector's Edition
summary: Can you prove your innocence?

name: Gratuitous Space Battles: Galactic Conquest
summary: There will be a time for peace in the galaxy, where life-forms can skip through the fields and read poetry, unworried by the threat of war, but this is not that time. There will be a time for song, time for cakes, time for long afternoon strolls, but this is not that time.

name: Grounds of Glory
summary: Grounds of Glory is an online arena-based PvP game. It features destructible elements, proper projectile collision and reactive spells and abilities. Its fast-paced and action-packed combat is heavily dependant on positioning, reaction speed and aiming your projectiles.

name: Gratuitous Space Battles: The Order
summary: Be warned heathen un-believers. The Galaxy is not your plaything. This galaxy was created in a weekend by the one true god, and he has no room in it for the likes of heathen aliens such as you. If your species is not listed in the holy book of the one true god, then it's pretty clear you are a mistake, and the order is here to rectify...

name: Grayscale
summary: Follow the story of Samael, a young man who awakens in the unfamiliar world of Libra, several years after an apocalyptic event. He is soon taken in by a settlement of survivors hoping to survive and thrive in this new, dangerous world they now call home. Join the survivors as they learn to believe in their future, despite the destruction they have witnessed.

name: Grasshopper Farm
summary: A simple text-based Idle game hosted in Telegram. This game revolves around collecting fun and quirky blockchain Grasshoppers utilizing the Enjin ecosystem. Collect Grasshoppers, build your town, complete quests, and attack your opponents!

name: Greendog: The Beached Surfer Dude!
summary: Greendog is one unlucky surfer. He lost his board and got stuck with a cursed necklace. Greendog has to fight his way past a lot of crazed creatures and monsters to find the Aztec treasure or he'll never get rid of the curse!

name: Gronions
summary: Place yourself at the heart of a battle for the Universe, GRONIONS for PC, is a fast-paced single-player action shooter, about exploration, survival, 3 game modes: campaign, frenzy and odyssey(Deluxe Edition), with regular updates and constant evolution of bio galactic dominance.

name: Gravel: King of Buggies
summary: Off-road vehicles par excellence, the daredevil Buggies join the race with their quick and nimble handling. Gravel Channel now includes a new Off-road Masters episode where you can put yourself to the test.

name: Grav Blazer Squared
summary: Grav Blazer is an arcade space shooter with a focus on fast paced action. Players will experience procedurally generated levels with increasing difficulty. To beat a sector all space bases need to be defeated. Each base will constantly construct enemy ships to defend themselves and the ship type and strength is determined by what sector you are in. Skill based firing mechanics, rotational controlled power attacks, increasing level difficulty, and endless procedurally generated levels are some of the features players will experience.

name: Graveyard Miner
summary: Enter the world of Graveyard Miner, an exciting mobile game that combines the best of tycoon merge games and mining clicker games. As a graveyard miner, you'll explore graves to find treasures, bones, and artifacts, unlocking new graveyards, upgrading your minions, and collecting cards and special abilities to become a graveyard tycoon.

name: Grebit
summary: A Frogger clone. Get little Frog across the road. Each level will increase in difficulty as you progress.

name: Gravity Mummy
summary: "Gravity Mummy" is a platformer puzzle game. You play as a mummy guard who has different super powers to overcome the challenges: you can move heavy boxes, jump on the heads of bloodthirsty enemies, as well as move around the ceiling.

name: Gravity At Its Finest 2
summary: Gravity At Its Finest 2 is a fast paced arcade game where the player is in control of a falling cube. Collect coins to get more points and check out how far can you get while free falling. Be careful and get free fallin'!

name: Gravitee Wars
summary: A turn-based combat game made in Flash where players take control of feuding astronauts with an arsenal of different weapons. Players can directly shoot opposing astronauts to deplete their health points, or if shot at the right angle with an explosive, can send them flying into space or hurtling into the sun. The planets are destructible and projectiles are affected by gravity, meaning you can make shots weave around multiple planets. Players can upgrade their astronauts with more health and a longer target predictor or upgrade weapon ammo. This is the offline predecessor of Gravitee Wars Online.

name: Gravity At Its Finest
summary: Gravity At Its Finest is a fast paced arcade game where the player is in control of a falling cube and has to avoid obstacles and collect coins.

name: Great Journey: Mr. Penguin's Letter
summary: Child's adventure.

name: Grandia: Parallel Trippers
summary: This is the story of Yuuhi's journey to return home. To do this he must obtain three keys from different areas of the world so that he can unlock a seal in the Tower of White. The evil Gurgan, who is responsible for Yuuhi's appearance in this new world, must be defeated!

name: Great Battles of the American Civil War
Gruds in Space
summary: A graphical text-adventure written by Chuck Sommerville and Joseph Dudar and published by Sirius Software for various 8-bit homecomputers.

name: Gravel Gang
summary: Gravel Gang is a simple but challenging real-time strategy/tactic casual game. Make smart plans and show your strategic skills, fight and conquer the challenging maps to WIN! You will be richly rewarded for victories, you can buy epic heroes and show your skills with them.

name: Groomer
summary: Groomer is a relaxing simulation game where take on a role of groomer, a person that takes care of dogs.

name: Great Deal
summary: Similar to poker, your deck consists of the four different suits with values from 2 to ace, plus one joker card, so 53 cards in total. You don't hold them in your hand, though, but they fall down from the top of the screen into a play field 5 places wide and 5 places high, filling the bottom first. And your job is to arrange them into combinations such that they disappear and do not fill up the screen.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - DJMax Respect Pack
Grisaia Phantom Trigger 03&04
summary:
Grisaia Phantom Trigger 03
While Rena and Maki recover from their injuries, the other SORD members jet off overseas for a school trip. Within moments of their arrival, though, the Mihama gang are pulled into a manhunt for a SORD deserter, assisted by students Sylvia and Velvet of St. Aile's International School. Tohka's the star of the show this time around, but she's wrestling with her own issues? Old memories of her parents, and a promise to a friend that she wasn't able to keep...

“You're right. There's a reason we need to get back... even if it means crawling home on our hands and knees.”

“Let's meet up again someday... if we're still alive.”

And introducing Sengoku Ayame - Sengoku Ichiru's brother, and a handler at St. Aile's:

“If takin' her in alive's too much of a challenge, just get rid of her - I don't give a damn. I wanna see this mess cleaned up.”

What answers will Tohka find? She has the truth in her sight...

Grisaia Phantom Trigger 04
Kumashiro Megumi (Gumi), recently transferred from St. Aile's International School, has been training hard together with Rena and Maki - now fully recovered from their injuries. With the help of her mentor, Tohka, she’s shaping up to be a fine sniper.

Just as one new student settles in, another has her sights set on joining the girls in Class A, Mihama’s elite combat unit. Her name? Sengoku Taiga. Haruto, the team’s handler, has one condition for Taiga’s transfer: that Chris serves as her supervising officer.
The two seem an unlikely pair at first, but after spending some time with little Taiga, Chris soon finds a way to see things from her perspective.

It’s at that moment that the nation is suddenly rocked by a terror attack on an unprecedented scale. Chris rushes to the scene, aware of what’s at stake, but paying no heed to the dangers ahead.

Just as she did, once before.

“This is even worse than we could’ve imagined...”
“Two of the guys are dead! What happened? What the hell happened!?”
“Y’know what it means to bring nukes into the country...?”
“It’s scary, shooting someone for the first time... My legs are shaking.”
“That fool... Is she trying to ruin everything!?”

The death toll keeps on rising, but SORD are stuck watching helplessly from the sidelines. What destiny awaits Chris, Taiga... and Mihama Academy?

“Oh, right... I must have died...”

Clutching to memories of her long-dead mother, she too prepares for an eternity of slumber...

name: Grid16
summary: Play 16 games in a giant grid all at once! After one ends the other begins, and as you play longer the game will speed up faster and faster. Definitely has some roots in the 4 second series. This game does a better job simplifying goals and objectives, and will give you a breakdown of your skills at the end! Use your gaming instincts... instructions are extremely limited!

name: Grapefruit
summary: Grapefruit is a research-creation project exploring the concept of videogames rules by Salen and Zimmerman through the work of Yoko Ono, specifically the event scores or performative instructions published in Grapefruit.

name: Grow Turret
summary: PixelStar Games 4th grow series Grow Turret.

name: Grot Slasher
summary: Upgrade your character and try to survive in an endless maze filled with scary creatures. Smash all the items on the level so that the souls that have been hiding there for several hundred years get out of them, and move further along the dungeon.

name: Grand Slam Tennis
summary:
Play against the "PRO" competitor or against a friend
Serve and "ACE"
Try your backhand
Watch out for the smash
No worry about the weather - play "Grand Slam Tennis" any time
Scores and plays like the game you know

name: Growth Fish
summary: Easy fish action game.Eat the food, increase the fish population, make the fish bigger and survive.

name: Grandpa And Granny Home Escape
summary: Grandpa And Granny House Escape is a horror game where you will be chased by an insane grandpa and a scary granny. Oh, they adore playing hide-and-seek. Surely, it is not an ordinary hide-and-seek fun – but a tough survival experience. Grandpa and granny always find a new victim to play their cruel game of survival. Your escape will not be easy because granny and grandpa are very experienced hunters.

name: Gravity
summary: Change the direction of gravity to navigate through packs of levels in this fast-paced, high skill ceiling game! Designed for speed running, this game features a leaderboard, a split timer, and a level editor out of the box.

name: Grand Lines
summary: A puzzle game inspired Portal series. The game begins with awakening of main character. You heard the robotic voice explaining the principle of testing. You will have to pass the test chambers and understand what is happening in the complex.

name: Gravity Angels Part 3: Payback
summary:
Gravity Angels Part 3: Payback is the third part in the epic Gravity Angels saga of Multipath Movies. These are not 'games' in the strict sense of the word, but digitally animated stories, rendered in real-time by the graphic engine, which can be influenced by the viewer at certain points in the story line.

After the events in the previous episode, the alien ship has started moving slowly towards the surface, gradually destroying the Ganymede colony in the process. The team has no choice but to go into the alien vessel and find a way to stop this.

To add to the predicament, Green, the base sheriff, who is now alone but still at large, is moving to make sure that if he doesn't make it out alive no- one else will either.

Our heroes split up into small teams to foil Green's sabotage plan and save the base. Many dangers await along the way and not everyone might live to see another day, but if they do, they'll make sure to get some... payback!

name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger 01&02
summary: After Yuuji Kazami and the gang's battle to the death several years ago, new girls unite at Mihama Academy, which has been reinstated as a 'specialist training school'. The characters enter a new chapter in this renewed series that takes place in the same world as The Fruit of Grisaia! This thrilling story that unfolds at the reborn Mihama Academy will undoubtedly excite not only those who have played previous releases, but those who are new to the series as well! Text available in three languages! Text can be set to Japanese, English or Simplified Chinese (audio is Japanese only). This includes in-game text, options, and the digital manual. Language settings can be changed at any time. Play using only the touch screen! Play with one hand! Play in handheld mode with the Nintendo Switch Joy-Con controllers attached, or detach them and play with just the touch controls! While in tabletop mode or TV mode, everything can be controlled by one Joy-Con (R), allowing you to play with only one hand! Also available for the Nintendo Switch Lite. (A separate Joy-Con (R) is required to play with one hand.) Summary ・Volume 1 The goal of SORD is to train a new generation of operatives to defend the country against future threats. To that end, the organization has established a series of schools up and down the country. Mihama Academy, more-or-less left to rot after its abrupt closure, has been given new purpose as one such 'specialist training school'. Mihama now entrusts the misfit girls who attend…

name: Graveyard: The Shift
summary: Always wanted to work in a graveyard? Maybe, maybe not. But now you have a chance to experience it! Graveyard Shift is a horror thriller based in a graveyard where you work the literal graveyard shift, but nothing is what it seems. Explore this supernatural world and uncover its secrets!

name: Grapplania
summary: Join Lynn, a descendant of a long line of whip-wielding warriors, in a 2D adventure through a perilous, abandoned castle filled with treasure.

name: Grab-A-Crab
summary: Grab-A-Crab is a top view single screen maze game inspired by the arcade game Pac-Man where you play the role of Hobbler the Gobbler who will eat anything. You have discovered a cavern with old turtle eggs and you plan to eat them all over various levels to fulfill your large appetite. As you eat the eggs around the maze, four crabs also move around the maze and have to be avoided or you lose one of three lives. There are four dodo eggs in each corner and if eaten allow you to eat the crabs for a short period of time. If you eat a lobster pot in the centre of the maze then you receive an extra dodo egg.

name: Grand Slam
summary: Grand Slam is a baseball video game that includes both a pitching meter and a power meter, one of the first baseball video games to do so.

name: GrindCraft
summary: GrindCraft is a Minecraft-themed clicker game based on crafting. Collect various raw materials and climb the crafting ladder to create stronger items. Hover over craftable items to reveal the resources required to create them.

name: Grim Survivor
summary: Grim Survivor is a top-down roguelike 2D dark casual game where you try to survive waves of enemies and power-up your hero to try to climb a leaderboard! Choices are important and the hordes of enemies get bigger over time.

name: Greed for Glory: War Strategy
summary: Greed for Glory is a brilliant city defense game that combines building with strategy in a colorful medieval fantasy world. Lead a mighty army of knights, elves, wizards, dragons, and other fantasy creatures in exciting and fun battles. Raid, destroy defenses, and steal resources against thousands of other players or in single player campaigns.

name: Graveyard Keeper: Breaking Dead
summary:
Introducing Breaking Dead - the first expansion of Graveyard Keeper!
Create an army of undead workers that automate chores around your Graveyard such as:

Automate gathering of stone, wood, and have zombies craft your items.
Taking care of your graveyard's garden has never been easier when zombies do it for you.
Create logistics chains where zombies automate sale of merchandise, for extra profit.
Modify and upgrade your zombies (they might need better organs) to make them more efficient.

name: Green Zone
summary: Earn points with central zones but watch out for wind. Try to get a high score before the minute timer runs out.

name: Gradius
summary: Commodore 64 port of Gradius.

name: Grappling Ball
summary: Grappling Ball is a single player platformer where you control a ball with a grapple gun and use it to go up against 10 levels which increase in difficulty

name: Groove Club
summary: Art house game by eccentric creative Antoine Josset. The Groove Club is at the end of Paradise Lost Boulevard. Dont be late for your rendezvous....

name: Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters
summary: The Apple iOS version of Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters, which released at the same time as the console release. Unlike the console release, it plays like a rail shooter.

name: Greedy Goblin
summary: Loot Legendary Artifacts and Gold While Outwitting Your Foes.

name: Gronk Want Rock
summary: You play as Gronk. Gronk likes to collect rocks, the best rocks are at the bottom of deep caverns. You have to bring Gronk's favorite rock up to his house by carefully throwing the rock onto flat platforms on the walls of the cavern.

name: Great Qin Warriors
summary:
In the year 2164, a wormhole into an alternate realm was opened by accident, and malevolent creatures known as "replicators" have emerged from there. A bitter war was fought, but the replicators had overwhelming numerical superiority. They managed to replicate the entire Earth, and a suicide mission was sent to destroy this alternate Earth with an energy bomb, by reaching as deep as possible into its core. However, the heroes were unable to reach the core, and were forced to engage their alternate plan - detonate the bomb at the wormhole in hope of closing it.

When they came to, they found they had crashed landed on Earth, more specifically in China of the year 241 BC, right in the middle of a battle where five kingdoms have united to challenge the dominant Qin nation. Upon seeing the survivors in their mecha suits, they regarded them as gods, and fled in fear. The twelve people from the future have turned into the Great Qin Warriors, helping the ruler of the country to conquer the entire China, found the Qin dynasty, and become the First Emperor. But the price to pay for this glory is too high - the twelve heroes must find a way to return to their own time and save the Earth.

Great Qin Warriors is a mecha-type first-person shooter. The single-player mode is mission-based; the player selects available missions, which take him to various exotic locations of different regions and time periods. A multiplayer mode is available as well.

name: Gravity Spin
summary: Gravity Spin is a metroidvania with a literal spin.

name: Grav Grav Gravity
summary: Use your own force of gravity to pass, seemingly impassable levels! This is a real hardcore for fans of difficult levels and true competition. You will go through each of these levels and prove to everyone what you can do?

name: Griddlers Ted and Pet 2
summary: 120 new Japanese crosswords - take a stroll through places long forgotten by time!

name: Grid Glyphs
summary: Grid Glyphs is a nonogram-style puzzle game for the Playdate.

name: Greed Boxes
summary: Greed Boxes is a 2D clicker game. Our world has been overrun by loot boxes. You are the chosen one to defeat greed and capitalism. Destroy them instead of spending your money. Maybe you will get some nice loot in the process. Are you ready?

name: Gravitas!
summary: In this fast paced puzzle-shooter mash-up, you are the captain of the defense force of Gravitas, a peaceful galaxy far away from Earth. One day a wormhole appears in the center of Gravitas and begins raining debris and trash into the atmosphere of the galaxy’s various planets. To defend against the invasion, you must match three or more of the same types of trash and launch them back into the wormhole. Hit the wormhole with enough debris to save each planet. Complete all 20 levels to eventually uncover the source of the wormhole and shut it down.

name: Grow Beets Clicker
summary:
Are you ready to play Beet Growers? The plant farming game filled with colour, candy and adventure! Meet the Beet Buddies! They are like birds - they hatch from eggs, and each of them is unique. Beet Buddies have a sweet tooth, and that's why they like sweets and candy most of all! Feed the Beet Buddies and watch them evolve and grow.
Beet Buddies love to dress up - put some funny clothes on them to create your own beet story!

name: GrayScale
summary: It is an action puzzle game that aims at a goal while breaking a wall with a stage composed of white and black. With a simple operation, you can enjoy the exhilarating feeling that breaks the wall and the depth of the puzzle.

name: Gred
summary: A young child from a road sign has been lost and your goal is to find him ! Incarn BOTH green and red light men and use their powers to switch time and voyage through multiple environments to save him.

name: Grey Instinct: Part 2
summary: Grey Instinct: Part 2 continues off with Grey and Kana being attacked by a mysterious intruder! They chase after him and stumble into an even bigger mystery! What's going on? Where is Uncle David? And more importantly, will Grey get any better at dating?!?

name: Gransta Chronicle
summary: Gransta Chronicle is a Role-Playing game, developed by Tom Create and published by Omega Micott, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Great Game 1/5
summary: An adventure in online gaming and commentary.

name: Gridland
summary: Match. Build. Survive.

name: Gremlins, Inc.: Card Game, Print & Play Set
summary: Gremlins, Inc. – CARD GAME is the original standalone card game set in the world of Gremlins, Inc. The game is designed for 2 to 6 players, with average playtime of 30-60 minutes per session, and has been enjoyed by hundreds of board game enthusiasts from all over the world since 2015.

name: Growth Spurt: A Meandering Intermission into the Afterhours of a Miscalculation
summary: A faux pas at the Middle School dance reverts Nour back to their primordial state and sends them on a one-night maximalist transformative journey. Flop, slide, leap, and rocket around the city filled with zany future friends and mysterious architectures. Play eclectic mini-games where you will discover whether surgery can be joyful, if aliens have feelings, and how to deal with a bad boss.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
summary: In this port of Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories to the PS2, PS3, IOS and Android, former trusted wise guy for the Leone family, Toni Cipriani returns home to Liberty City after spending time in hiding for killing a made man. Now, the streets of Liberty City are in turmoil, as warring families vie for control and the town begins to self-destruct under waves of political corruption, organized crime, drug trafficking and union strikes. Deranged hit men, morally depraved tycoons, cynical politicians and even his own mother stand in the way as Toni tries to bring the city under Leone family control.

name: Grave Complex
summary: The post-apocalyptic survival, tower-defense rogue-lite. Gather resources, set up defenses and protect critical points from the amassing hordes.

name: Gravity Lane 981
summary: Gravity Lane 981 is an original first-person puzzle game – our love letter to the Portal series. We‘re here to provide you not only with a fresh game mechanic that lets you manipulate gravity but also a thrilling, funny and heart-warming story.

name: Grapple Whip
summary: You are a cowboy without legs and uses his grapple whip to move around!

name: Green General
summary: Follow Almeric as he goes on a journey guided by a mysterious figure. Complete Quests, meet other characters and fight monsters in turn-based battles. Fight against the demon lords and uncover your fate.

name: Gridlee
summary: Gridlee is a game that was never released. It was developed by Videa, Inc. in 1982, on hardware designed by Howard Delman. Videa was eventually acquired by Pizza Time Theater and formed the core of their new Sente Technologies division. The hardware that Gridlee ran on evolved into the Bally/Sente SAC I system, which provided a cartridge-based arcade gaming platform that supported such games as Snake Pit, Stocker, and Hat Trick.

name: Green Eyed Monster
summary: Fight monsters in the woods with your ex-girlfriend

name: Grand Battle--MMO Strategy:War
summary: Grand Battle is a ilitary MMO game for Android. It enables you as a commander and you are responsible for your army, your base and your combat power.

name: Green Hale
summary: Small green temple map using a custom texture set. It also features a custom skybox and the map source is included.

name: Grim Tales: Echo of the Past
summary: Who's puppeteering the past?

name: Green Hill Paradise Act 2: Final Mix
summary:
Green Hill Paradise was born out of a question. A question that has all but torn the Sonic the Hedgehog community asunder:

Can a Sonic the Hedgehog game be made such that it supplies a rich and robust experience in a fully 3D environment while staying true to its platforming roots?

We are here to answer this question, not through an in-depth analysis video, not through a lengthy forum post, but through a fully playable video game experience. After 10 months of research and development we believe that, yes, Sonic can not only exist in 3D, but he can THRIVE in it. GHP's massive environment, winding paths, dynamic physics and hidden collectibles provide players with the freedom to choose where they want to go and how they wish to get there. The only limitations are the laws of physics and the player's own skill.

No Spline paths.
No Boostpads.
No scripted cameras.
No Boost Button.

Gotta Go Fast?
Earn it.

This is Green Hill Paradise, reborn.

name: Gregor Hills Haunted Hospital
summary: Gregor Hills Haunted Hospital is a Top Down survival horror game based on the story of one of the most Haunted hospitals located in Gregor Hills.

name: gridCrack
summary: Y'all wanna get in on some of this cyberspace? >>Slot your deck, put your trodes on & get to slingin hot bits @the nastiest deathcorp drones on the net w/ the GridGuardians >>Keep the net free for all users w/ this VR|OS packed w/ the latest in streetsofts, get to hackin them Gibsons already!

name: Green Hell VR: The Spirits of Amazonia Part 1
summary: In this story expansion, you will experience a new adventure that serves as a prequel to the main story of Green Hell VR. Once again, step into the shoes of Jake Higgins and do your best to gain the trust of the Mu’agi tribe, the chief of an indigenous Amazonian village. To do this, you must complete missions based on local legends, help tribe members, and provide supplies for the village. All of this, of course, is tailored specifically for VR.

name: Groove Adventure Rave: Mikan no Hiseki
summary: A Japanese anime themed RPG based on Rave Master.

name: Grisly Grottos
summary: 10 speedmaps + start map inspired by e1m4 - The Grisly Grotto. Mappers had 60 hours to create a map using custom progs - based on Copper and featuring the diving gear from Dwell - with no restrictions on texturing or gameplay other than the prompt.

name: Grapple League
summary: Utilize skill to swing yourself through multiple jaw-dropping levels in this time-trial, swinging, physics based platformer. From oceans to canyons to mountains and beyond take your swinging prowess across the world in obstacle filled levels. Swing into the finish. Set new records.

name: Grille Logic
summary: Use the arrow-shaped pieces, puzzles become a habit with a new sense of clear and simple enough that we have written more in the direction of the frame and put him inaccurate. Four longitudinal field next stage mass four trout, all arrows next piece in the time limit and we adapt to the frame appears clear the stage. All 50 progressively more difficult to try to clear the puzzle of the stage.

name: Gravity puzzles
summary: Indie puzzle game in which you have to use gravity and change it to solve the puzzles.

name: Gravity Block 2
summary: Gravity Block 2 is a minimalist puzzle game where the player must control the environment to make the Block reach the end.

name: Grimace vs. Skibidi
summary: Help Grimace stop the tennis balls fired by Skibidi Toilet. It takes speed and precision, make one mistake and you’re out!

name: Gravitus Minus
summary: Gravitus Minus is based on the classic gravity-based shooters from the 1980s and early 90s, such as Thrust, Solar Jetman and Gravitar.

name: Grind Zones
summary: Welcome to the Grind Zones, the bright and colorful fantasy world filled by magic, heroes and amazing creatures! Explore the territories, fight monsters, collect the potions and loot, buy new weapons and equipment, unlock new skills to become the strongest hero of the Grind Zones!

name: Granny Smith
summary: Granny Smith is a fast-paced racing platformer filled with spectacular crashes and amazing stunts. Jump, glide, swing and smash your way through 57 hand-crafted levels in four distinct settings. Just be sure to land on your feet!

name: Gravlist
summary: Gravlist is gravitational 2d platformer. Our player tries to overcome all the obstacles in front of him to find his goal

name: Grandma's House: College Days
summary: MC goes back to college and has some sex. Your standard cookie-cutter college game with all the staples you've come to expect like walking down a hallway, sleeping in a dorm room and the classic "banging your bully's girlfriend" scene. A prequel short story to Grandma's House

name: Grim's Gambit
summary: Get ready for a tale where every cup poured is a step closer to unraveling the mysteries that bind the afterlife. Take on a soul-stirring quest as you serve lost souls, piece together your forgotten past, and unveil the chilling secrets of the Stygian Keep.

name: Gravity Circuit: Deluxe Edition
summary: Celebrate Gravity Circuit's first anniversary with this deluxe edition!

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Operation Victory
summary: First major Iranian counteroffensive named Operation "Nasr" in Khuzestan region in January 1981. The main role in the operation was assigned to the 16 and 92ArmBde units. Also, IRGC and militia units were brought to participate in the operation.

name: Grand Battle
summary: In this intense fully featured Action RPG, players fight with multiple heroes to save the world. And sometimes they chill and do some crafting!

name: Grim Tales 5: Bloody Mary
summary: Grim Tales 5: Bloody Mary is a hidden object game developed by Elephant Games and published by Big Fish Games for PC, Android and Mac platforms.

name: Groove Balls
summary: Groove Balls is an intense rhythm game that equips you with sticks and blades and pits you against a barrage of balls generated by the music

name: Great Big War Game
summary: Taking military "advice" from the ridiculous generalissimo, can you battle your way through this truly massive, content-packed military campaign? Plan your missions, deploy your forces, try not to fall off the sofa laughing! You've plenty of units to play with, covering land, sea and airborne combat. Be warned though, these funny cartoon troops are not exactly the right stuff.

name: Gravity Box
summary: Gravity Box is a retro-styled score attack game that requires the player to frantically swap gravity in order to avoid hazards. Grab the gems, unlock cool costumes, and see how long you can last!

name: Grime
summary: A set of 5 maps using the Duke 3D texture pack.

name: Grow Your Team
summary: In this 2D RPG platformer, you fight enemies, gain seeds, and grow different body parts to build custom characters with unique abilities. Upgrade their intelligence, combat proficiency, acquire new skills, and discover new weapons and unique items. Let’s Grow Your Team!

name: Grid 2: Bathurst Track Pack
summary: Download the Bathurst Track Pack to receive two routes to race at Australia's famous Mount Panorama, Motor Racing Circuit Bathurst. You’ll also receive two cars packing raw power under the hood - the Nissan Skyline GT-R Group A (R32) and Ford Sierra RS500 - and the stunning Ford Racing Ute.

name: Graveyard Shift
summary: Scavenge, tiptoe, and fight your way to the surface in this dangerously cute puzzle and stealth game where everyone can hear—but not see—everything you do.

name: Grass Cut
summary: Grass Cut is a casual puzzle game where the main objective is to place the lawn mower in the correct place to cut all the grass.

name: Grim Tales: The Heir - Collector's Edition
summary: You've got one dangerous family.

name: Gravity Well
summary: On a derelict research space station, you'll find yourself solving puzzles to complete a high value contract, but in the end, will the job be worth it?

name: Grow and Smile: For Balling
summary: The ball is round and can become bigger or smaller. Its attack depends on your skill. May be very tired, but happiness comes with you...

name: Greenlander
summary: A brutal top-down action game set in a gloomy Medieval Greenland.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Drive on Voronezh
summary: Intending to enter Voronezh from the south, on July 4, 1942, units of the German 24 TD crossed the Don river without heavy equipment and began advancing in the direction of Voronezh. 232 RD and 110 TBde were to stand in the breach.

name: Grow Valley
summary:
Click panels in your selected order. Items you click will grow and grow with each turn. You will complete the game when all panels' level is max. They effect each other as they grow. So you have to think about the clicking order.

There is a normal ending and a secret ending.

name: Grr Boo I
summary: GRR BOO i est un plateformer 2D. Il se distingue par ses graphismes enfantins, mais ne vous y trompez pas, la difficulté est trop grande pour des enfants.

name: Greed
summary: Greed is a 3 vs 1 competitive multiplayer game. Play as the Dungeon Master and defend your treasures or join the group of three cursed Adventurers seeking to claim them for their master: the god of Greed.

name: Great Merchant
summary: Great Merchant is a 2D fantasy MMORPG set in East Asia. As the first online based economically driven game, this character building MMORPG is set in 16th century Asia around the countries of Joseon(Korea), Japan, China, and Taiwan.

name: Gruel
summary: Go on a rampage in this endless arcade Boomer-Shooter! Gain the weirdest weapons and destroy all the monsters in the never-ending temple of GRUEL!

name: Graal Online
summary: Graal Online is a top-down fantasy MMORPG. Originally conceived as an online version of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past, it allowed users to edit and script custom areas and submit them to be added to the world.

name: Gridiron Thunder
summary:
This Hard Hitting Retro Football Game Will Keep You Coming Back For More As You Compete Against Your Friends And Other Opponents To See Who Really Is King Of The Gridiron!

Now With Realtime News, Awesome Cheats, And Other Refinments!

name: Gravity Tilt
summary:
Gravity Tilt is a challenging puzzle game were the goal is to get the earth through a maze of barriers. This game takes full advantage of the iPads accelerometer. You move the earth by simply tilting the device in the direction you want earth to move.
Along the way you must avoid a variety of obstacles. Some worm-holes have gravity that pulls the earth in. Others have a repulsive force that pushes the earth away. Try to navigate through the maze of obstacles to reach the goal in the least amount of time.

name: Grand Gate
summary: Summon your Towers. Defend yourself from the Gateborn, sworn enemies of humanity. Discover the secrets of the Grand Gate in this Tower Defense RPG game.

name: Grief
summary: A short visual novel about the day to day life of a grieving women. Join her story and make the right decisions so she can get out of a cycle that seems to have no end.

name: Grave Matters
summary: Puzzle your way through a near infinite amount of Minesweeper inspired levels, using quick wits and special skills to avoid disturbing the Steamborgs (steam-powered-cyborgs) who lurk six foot under, ready to pull Harey Burke to his doom - it is not going to be easy!

name: Grace of Letoile
summary:
Throw yourself into fierce battles to steal Sertzes, the cores of automatas able to make wishes come true! The twelve numbers engraved on the Chronos Gauge are the key to victory!

Vedley, who lost his parents in a sad incident, hears from Achieitz about the existence of the Letoiles, who are able to make any wish come true.
In order to turn back time and try to save his parents, Vedley makes a pact with a Letoile and becomes her Maschelle, and they throw themselves into the battles to steal Sertzes from the other Letoiles.

Control time, baffle enemies, and turn the course of battles! After all the ferocious fighting... What awaits Vedley?

Skill Gems have many different powers, and when fitted into a Skill Plate, a Gem makes it possible for a character to use magic or a skill.
By combining Gems, characters may also be able to use special skills.
Also, by flicking a Skill Plate, it can be rotated, and it is easy to change the positions of skills already fitted directly corresponding to the Chronos Gauge.

The outcome of every battle comes down to the tactics you choose!
During battles, the character icons are shown on the left-hand side of the screen, and next to them, a range of effects are sometimes displayed.
These are known as Field Effects, and if a character’s turn comes while one of those effects is shown next to their icon, the character can gain the benefits of that effect.
However, Field Effects are not always advantageous. There are also disadvantageous effects. Also, effects apply to apply to both enemies and allies. However, by raising the level of the Chronos Gauge to 100% or more, you can launch Interrupt Actions. When an advantageous effect is attached to an enemy, or when a disadvantageous effect is attached to an ally, you can use an Interrupt Action to change the order of the characters' actions, and avoid these unfavorable situations.

The Chronos Gauge holds the key to victory!
The Chronos Gauge is necessary for characters to be able to use the Particular Skills they each have, or to be able to launch Interrupt Actions, with which the order of the characters' actions can be changed. The Gauge has a display like a clock, with the numbers 1 to 12, and at the start of a battle one of the numbers will glow. The glowing number will move clockwise each time an ally or enemy performs an action. At this time, if you use a skill corresponding to the glowing number, a Just Time Bonus will be triggered, and the level of the Gauge will recover by a large amount. Also, the level of the Gauge increases, although only by a little, when enemies are defeated.

The Gauge is shared across all party members, so it's a good idea to pay attention to the level as you use Particular Skills and launch Interrupt Actions!

name: GravPool
summary: A simulation of the version of billiards that space pilgrims played during the starship migrations of the 2300s. Instead of aiming for pockets on a flat plane, you have six degrees of freedom with which to aim your shots. There are some new obstacles that make things a little more chaotic. If you want to bend the laws of physics and get a little crazy, or are just interested in the historical significance of the game, GravPool may be up your alley.

name: Grimm Shuffle
summary: A memory game with pictures in a Japanese cute & fairy theme style, rearranged from the actual board game "Grimm Shuffle". Easy gameplay with relaxed play time. Complete the tutorial & play in different difficulties.

name: GrundHeim
summary: GrundHeim Player would explore a world from a bird's-eye view. The game would feature a unique crafting and skill-searching mechanic, the player would encounter challenging enemies and obstacles, requiring them to use their skills and crafting abilities to overcome them.

name: Graffiti Cozy
summary: Graffiti Cozy - open-world 3D-platformer where you can explore city with jetpack, bomb graffiti spots and chill out with bouncy hip-hop soundtrack - and all of that at toy-like smooth vibes.

name: Grand Theft Auto III: 10 Year Anniversary Edition
summary: Rockstar Games celebrates the 10th anniversary of one of the most influential games of all time. The critically acclaimed blockbuster Grand Theft Auto III comes to mobile devices, bringing to life the dark and seedy underworld of Liberty City. With a massive and diverse open world, a wild cast of characters from every walk of life and the freedom to explore at will, Grand Theft Auto III puts the dark, intriguing and ruthless world of crime at your fingertips.

name: Grim Borough
summary:
Grim Borough; a short but sweet map pack designed by Jerry with help from Re-fund (AKA racx_00) for Chasm: The Rift. See the description for further info.

In this short set of three levels you play as Corporal Alexei, who has received a seek-and-destroy mission from HQ to wipe out one of the last Timestriker platoons in existence. Keep an eye out for all 5 secret supply drops!

name: Gray
summary: This story is about a man that somehow wakes in the body of a little robot. Gray is a platform-puzzle game combined with an erotic visual novel.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars
summary: Grand Theft Auto: Chinatown Wars is an entirely original entry into the critically acclaimed Grand Theft Auto series, and brings a new level of interactivity to its sprawling open environments. With the use of the DS touch screen, players navigate their way through the streets as they uncover the truth behind an epic tale of crime and corruption within the Triad crime syndicate, delivering the unprecedented amount of depth that has become a true trademark of the franchise.

name: Grand Emprise 2: Portals Apart
summary: Survival crafting adventure Through magical portals Into fantasy worlds. Once-in-a-lifetime, high-paced, high-variety. The sequel to Grand Emprise: Time Travel ️

name: Grauen no Torikago: Kapitel 6 - Senritsu
summary: Grauen no Torikago: Kapitel 6 - Senritsu is the sixth and final chapter of a horror movie sold exclusively through the Dreamcast Direct online service.

name: Gravitaws
summary: Gravitaws is a retro-style stage shooter inspired by Jaws (NES). Explore a dynamic overworld map. Collect research materials and upgrades, while evading an Alien invader. The story is delivered in classic style cutscenes. Fight bosses, survive, collect, fish, and bomb your way to victory.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Diamond Casino & Resort
summary: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Diamond Casino & Resort is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The update introduces The Diamond Casino & Resort, a newly-opened business located in East Vinewood where the original Vinewood Casino was found. The casino features an exclusive penthouse, casino floor, and garage storage.

name: Groove that Goob
summary: Abduct the Milky Way's Oracle Jukebox located at the top floor of a penthouse party as the shapeshifting, absorbent Goob, fully equipped with a ravenous appetite for melodies, mankind, and mosh pits.

name: Gravity Brawl
summary: Gravity Brawl is a 2d multiplayer shooter in zero gravity with tons of unique characters, wacky weapons, and power-ups. Shoot everything in sight while celebrating wins with your friends on team mode or solo play in 1 on 1 matches in a set of playable arenas to fly through. Shoot and you shall fly away, pushed back by your weapon backfire, drifting in the zero gravity arena where other brawlers are just waiting for your kill shot.

name: Gryphon
summary: As a Gryphon you have to gather gold in order to rebuild the bridges to different areas which are infested with the ID monsters.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Shield of the Prophet
summary: Become an active participant in the alternative history of the Soviet invasion into Afghanistan in 1979

name: Grime House
summary:
Grime House is a top down survival horror game in the style of the truly oldschool era of gaming.

Help Thomas escape from the horrors of Grime House as you explore, solve puzzles and defend yourself from the grotesque.

name: Graveyard Shift at Freddy's
summary:
"Graveyard Shift at Freddy's" is a small Re-Imagining of the original Five Nights at Freddy's, with new twists and turns! Featuring brand new mechanics, visuals, characters, and an entirely new story for you to unravel.

Venture into "Freddybear's Eatery and Fun", watch feeds, and ensure nothing gets damaged.

name: Grand Prix Circuit
summary: This port features re-arranged music, different sound, and slightly different graphics.

name: Grow Your Pets
summary: You found a mysterious egg. By deciding to open it, your life has changed forever. Now you are the Pet Grower. Everyone thinks that all these creatures are extinct. But you know that there is someone, who chose exactly you. Wander through the forest, fish for food, upgrade pets. This is your world!

name: Grand Prix Circuit
summary: This port features different graphics due to hardware limitations.

name: Greg Norman's Golf Power
summary: Close your eyes and imagine the perfect golf course. Whether you conjure up an image of a real-life, world famous course or visualize a championship course all of your own design - if you can dream it, you can play it with Greg Norman's GOLF POWER. Our exclusive course designer with battery back-up allows you to customize your own 18-hole championship course and then save it in memory. Create a dream course, play one of the pre-set courses in England, Scotland, the USA or Japan, or rejoin a saved game right where you left off. Just like the Great White Shark, you'll need total concentration, strategy and control to make the leader board.

name: Gray Grofa
summary:
Gray Grofa is an unparalleled side-scrolling shooter puzzle game developed
for the 8-bit MSX computer.
2 years have been spent hand-tuning the game's visuals, movements and
puzzles in a tireless pursuit for aesthetic perfection.

name: GrannyHop
summary: The game "GrannyHop" is an arcade game where grandma jumps on a graveyard, passes difficult levels, collects bonuses and defeats obstacles. Addictive gameplay and colorful graphics.

name: Gregg: Tower Defence
summary: Play as Gregg. Gather, build and destroy your slimy enemies in this thrilling pixel art tower defence!

name: Great Party Games
summary: Have fun with the family with this great compilation of 20 classic games like Foosball, Bowling, Air Hockey, Table Tennis and more. With something for everyone Great Party Games will give you and your family hours of fun, either playing on your own against the computer or playing multiplayer against each other

name: Ground Parkour: First Mission
summary: Ground parkour: First Mission, in short, you compete with yourself to reach the highest point on the track with different characters and different abilities in a construction site in the city. Each character has different abilities and you progress on this track full of obstacles. Enjoy!

name: Grave Man
summary: Stop the dead from rising, wack 'em back!

name: Grand Ages: Medieval - Limited Special Edition
summary:
It is the year 1050 AD. At the beginning of the High Middle Ages development in Europe has seen an unprecedented level of progress and a rapidly growing population spreads across the length and breadth of the continent. New frontiers are explored, settlements founded and vast trading routes established. As the head of one of these small settlements, it falls upon you to lead your people towards greatness.
Explore a vast world, gather resources, encounter other societies and use your trading expertise to expand and make your fortune. Found new cities, progress your nation with inventive technology and protect your trade routes against barbarian attacks until you are powerful enough to begin your conquest over Europe and forge a bold new empire.

Limited Edition Includes:
2 DLC's - Camelot and Ancient Worlds
A 2-sided Tech Tree Poster

name: Green Lava Studios Volume 1
summary:
All of your favorite Green Lava Studios experiences on one physical disc for the PS4. This is an open pre-order for a limited time. Includes My Name Is Mayo, My Name Is Mayo 2, and Mr. Massagy. 
 
My Name Is Mayo: Before you judge a mayo, you must walk a mile in its flask! Step into the world of Mayo, as you walk through a philosophical journey that requires tapping like a maniac. In this clicker game maybe you can even open the flask! 
 
My Name Is Mayo 2: This is a clicker game about a mayonnaise jar. It’s also creamy, dreamy and properly sequel-y! Right in the middle of the Next-Gen hardware hurricane, comes the true next-gen game everyone’s been waiting for! ...Not this one; but it’s close! This... is the touching story about a disorganized Mayo jar, who just can’t get its sheets together. 
 
Mr. Massagy: Use your dating skills to get a well-earned Massage through your gamepad controller! Everybody is someone like Johnny deep inside! So walk on his shoes and get back into the speed-dating game. Use your Linger app to choose from 9 eligible bachelorettes and get the ultimate reward: A well-earned controller rumble massage.

name: Green Day Revenge
summary: A version of Tap Tap Revenge for the iPhone featuring songs from the band Green Day.

name: Grief Syndrome
summary: Grief Syndrome is an action game based on popular anime "Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magika." There are five girls to choose from, and each comes with different arsenal. This game combines anime-style with hand drawn with pastel colour for background. RPG elements are also included where characters can raise their level. Another interesting feature is combo system and rewards that can be unlocked if meet certain conditions.

name: Grokai
summary: Grokai - An A.I. Generated Text Based "Choose Your Own Adventure" Game

name: Grim Tales: The Hunger
summary: Your niece Jackie Gray has been murdered by a killer whose crimes went unsolved 17 years ago. Team up with Jackie's policeman father and use your powers to go back in time and stop the killer before their murder spree claims Jackie's life in the present! Will you be able to solve the cold case, or will the killer rise again to begin another reign of terror? Travel into the past to find all the clues – and the villain!

name: Graviteam Tactics: Operation Star - Operation Hooper
summary: New battle area - Angola, Cuito-Cuanavale district

name: Greyskin
summary: Crawl through countless dungeons, fighting hordes of monsters in this unique, fast-paced Action RPG. Class-up, mutate, and survive as you loot, shoot, upgrade, and repeat. Descend into the depths of a strange and dark world filled with mysteries and uncover its secrets.

name: Grand Prix Formula One
summary: Live the intense experience of Formula One Racing !

name: Great Artists Steal
summary:
Handprint Games is collaborating with a local artist, SCR1BBLE, to create a beautiful new hand-drawn indie game: Great Artists Steal.

'Great Artists Steal' is a hand-drawn platformer in which you play a scribbled character in a 2-dimensional scribbled world, trying to steal famous masterpieces. Steal a new painting in each level before your ink runs out.

name: Great Toilet Simulator
summary: Great Toilet Simulator is a first-person indie horror telling you the story of a man who has his car broken on his way home, in the middle of a thick forest. What makes the situation even worse is that the main character is really in need of a toilet.

name: Grace's Quest: To Catch an Art Thief
summary: Stop a gang of art thieves before they steal all of the world's priceless treasures in Grace's Quest - To Catch an Art Thief. Grace is visiting The Louvre in Paris with her best friend Chloe when a group of thieves steals the Mona Lisa and takes Chloe hostage. Now Grace, along with an agent from Interpol, is on the hunt to catch the thieves and rescue Chloe.

name: Grimgrad
summary: Build your settlement to survive all the hardships of the dark Middle Ages and not to anger the Slavic gods!

name: Grey Lights
summary: A hub-style city map with all the usual urban locations from Shop-n-Bags to Sushi restaurants

name: Gravity Dash
summary: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through the neon-lit streets of a cyberpunk city in Gravity Dash, a 2D infinite runner that will test your reflexes and strategic skills. Immerse yourself in the retro atmosphere, accompanied by a pulsating synthwave soundtrack that sets the tone.

name: Greed: Black Border
summary: Hack ‘n slash your way through this science-fiction-themed action/RPG. In the futuristic universe of GREED, the discovery of new interstellar travel possibilities has led to a new age of colonialization. The five largest colonial powers are entangled in a full-scale war over a new element called Ikarium, the recently discovered rare source of nearly unlimited energy. As a former member of an elite military unit, you will fight a battle for your survival not knowing that your actions will lead the fate of all mankind into dramatic consequences…

name: Greyroad
summary: "The path to the grave is often grey"

name: Grimhunt
summary: Paranormal investigation game.The Grimoire hides many secrets and information precious to arcane investigators.Search for magical creatures, rare animals and the hidden world in this simulation game.

name: Green Cat
summary: Realm the protagonist exists inis an endless travelling upon the generated blocks. Each time you are offered a new scenario. You will have to make your decisions quickly! Be ready for traps, mines, space jellies and kamikazedogs on your way through. And only Octopus the Seller will help you in this incredibly challenging adventure. Prove your supremacy in chasing the infinity!

name: Grinded Meat
summary: Sheriff Walter is investigating on a series of missing person cases in the small town of Quiete hill. A misterious phonecall lead him to the Carson’s mansion on the country side. There he will find a bloodthirst killer that will chase him to grind his flesh. Will you survive? Quick time events

name: GrimmStar
summary: After a sudden and cataclysmic invasion, the Worlds of Terra are devastated. What remains of mankind are either scattered throughout the stars or reduced to migrant fleets. Guide the fate of the human race in a desperate struggle to evade the horrors from beyond our galaxy and uncover an ancient mystery that could turn the tides of war...

name: Gravitia
summary: Gravitia is an adventure game about manipulating gravity to escape a unique world full of mystery.

name: Graphsx
summary: You turned on your monitor right now? It isn't giving to you a image? Maybe the pixels of your monitor is in to a journey; why you don't help them in this hard physics-based puzzle platform journey. Explore hundreds of challenges, become more and more sharper and find out more about a pixel journey.

name: Groven
summary: Live as an aspiring blacksmith that wants to earn his fortune through his craft in this blacksmith RPG. Accept jobs from the village bulletin, gather materials in underground expeditions with your uncle and earn, earn, earn! Rise to become the greatest (and wealthiest) smith in all the kingdom!

name: Grand Cross: Age of Titans
summary:
The mysterious world of Skyna is engulfed in the chaos of darkness. Become the one who will save the world!
From customized troops, real-time controls, and special troops that can rain down fire from the sky, to tide-turning Liege Skills and ultimate mecha weapons called Titans, the battlefields of Skyna are varied and unpredictable.

name: Grooh
summary:
Grooh is a cute (and lazy?) monster that loves pineapples. Today, Grooh decides to explore the abandoned "Feilong Castle". There's a huge dragon printed on the entrance door!! But most importantly, rumors say that there's a secret treasure hidden there, and *who knows*, maybe it's full of pineapples?
That's why you, oh mighty player, should help Grooh to find the treasure!

name: Graveyard Birds
summary: Graveyard Birds is a 2d puzzle game. Guide Lemmy the bird through 50 devious levels and escape the clutches of the undead with the help of your friends!

name: Greed Hunters
summary: Earn rewards for your greed in this chaotic, multiplayer rogue-like game. Explore randomly generated dungeons with up to 8 players in a world where greed is the currency. To survive, you must outsmart and out-hoard your teammates.

name: Grace's Diary
summary: Will you make the call?

name: Greatest Moments of Our Time
summary: Greatest Moments of Our Time is a reference title produced in 1996 and includes an interesting mix of subjects. The main menu has some admin icons plus eight categories, one of which is a trivia game. The quiz has three levels of difficulty. It lasts for three rounds and has five timed, multiple choice questions per round, all the questions are based on the articles in the reference material on the disc.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Criminal Enterprises
summary: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Criminal Enterprises is a content update for Grand Theft Auto Online. The game features a wide range of GTA Online experience improvements, many of these the direct result of extensive and constructive feedback provided by the players.

name: Groops
summary: Groops is a puzzle game that will put your mind to the test. Match tiles three at a time based on either shared or completely unique attributes - the number of possibilities will tie your brain in knots! Keep your mind sharp.

name: Grave
summary:
The game about being buried alive.
About being powerless.

name: Great British Railway Journeys
summary: Take to the rails and start your own adventure driving iconic trains on real-world routes in the official game of Great British Railway Journeys.

name: Grand Mountain Adventure: Wonderlands
summary: Grand Mountain Adventure: Wonderlands is a beautiful open-world skiing & snowboarding game where you get to explore entire mountains filled with hundreds of challenges to discover and compete in. So strap on your skis or board and prepare for a great adventure in the snowy mountains!

name: Greenhouse
summary: An Orange Yoshi must protect his flowers from enemies by spitting watermelon seeds as he did in Yoshi's Island. In Classic Mode, the player has to protect flowers by using a spray gun.

name: Gran Vitreous
summary: Gran Vitreous is a PC shmup that combines classic arena shooter gameplay with the mechanics of a loot driven action RPG. Upgrade your ships equipment and level up as you battle through a galaxy filled with randomly generated encounters.

name: Gravitee Wars
summary: Battle across the galaxy in this turn-based space artillery game. Use the gravity of destructible planets to launch your shots at the enemy until only one team remains.Unlock new gear for your team members in the single player campaign and online multiplayer modes.

name: Graveyard Strolls
summary:
The sky is grey. The sun is setting. You’ve never been a believer in ghosts, but they still want to tell you all their secrets as you wander their graveyard.

Become a ghost therapist as you explore a graveyard at night.

name: Gravity Ball
summary:
Test your reflexes! 
 Gravity Ball is a game where you aim to make the best score. To do this, avoid obstacles on the path of your ball.

name: Granny's Grantastic Granventure
summary: While babysitting her grandchildren one evening, Beatrice fell asleep and they wandered off. Now she must proceed through a world filled with challenging obstacles, puzzling puzzles, and dank memes to be reunited with her little rascals.

name: Grimante
summary: 50+ levels of tactical combat boiled down to its addicting, puzzle-like core. Solve the battlefield.

name: Green Green: Overdrive Edition
summary: Remake version of Groover's Green Green.

name: Gravity+
summary: Gravity+ is a puzzle game suitable for all ages. You play a small robot on a space station and you have to find your way through a maze to the exit.

name: Great Hunt: North America
summary: Enjoy challenging hunting missions in Ontario, Alaska or Colorado. Use your hunting dog wisely, improve your arsenal and collect valuable trophies.

name: Greatest Heavyweights
summary: Eight World Heavyweight Champs Answer the Bell in this ultimate showdown to decide who's #1! Muhammad Ali, Jack Dempsey, Joe Frazier, Larry Holmes, Evander Holyfield, Joe Louis, Rocky Marciano, and Floyd Patterson - all in their prime and looking for knockouts! Each Champion looks and boxes in their signature styles. It's Ali's speed against Marciano's power, Holmes' stinging jab versus Frazier's devastating hook!

name: Granny: Chapter Two
summary: You have to escape Granny and Grandpa...You have five days...

name: Gravitrix
summary:
An updated rework of an unreleased game that Nils Hammerich originally completed over 20 years ago, GRAVITRIX brings arcade-style, mind-bending puzzle-action to your Commodore 64 like never seen before! 
 
Combine stones of four different gravity directions to solve each of the 120 levels across six themed worlds, but be wary of colour changers, conveyor belts, teleporters and other hazards! 
 
To complete each level, you must clear the screen of all of the coloured GRAVITRIX stones. ALL of the stones of EACH colour must be connected in a single 'group' in order for them to vanish, ie. you cannot have multiple, unconnected groups of the same colour in different areas of the screen. The big challenge in GRAVITRIX is that the stones don't just have different colours - they have different 'directions' (or gravity) as well! 
 
Each coloured stone 'falls' in its assigned direction (symbolised by an arrow) whenever there is nothing blocking its path, and this leads to some tricky chain reactions that must be solved. To make your life even harder there is also a time limit, environmental blocks and other gameplay elements that are introduced during the early levels. 
 
GRAVITRIX features: 
 
 Hours of puzzle-solving action! 
 Two 5.25" floppy disks worth of artwork and music! 
 Password save system! 
 Super-fast loading (512KB cartridge version only)! 
 Full NTSC/PAL support!

name: Gravels of Endless War
summary: Gravels Of Endless War - new turn-based online strategy game. You don’t have to lvl up, grind or do quests. There are no ads or P2W elements. Build your own unique team, discover the special abilites and start your Endless War for the War Relics.

name: Gravity
summary: Have fun with gravity!!!

name: Great Utopia
summary: Sci-Fi Retro RPG in which you become humanity's last child, and last hope. Interactive storytelling, puzzles and turn based combat will give you around 2 hours of gameplay to complete this futuristic epic journey to save mankind.

name: Graveyard Keeper: Collector's Edition
summary: Build & manage your own graveyard while finding shortcuts to cut costs, expand into entertainment with witch-burning festivals, and scare nearby villagers into attending church.

name: Grablox
summary: Ad-supported, freely available puzzle game currently exclusive to Android, in which players try to clear the board by gathering all the pieces into groups of three or more.

name: Grounseed
summary: A "minimalist" Japanese RPG developed by Studio Twinkle for the PC-98.

name: Griffin Card
summary: Card Game with your pet Griffin!

name: Grave Spirit
summary: Within an ancient land, undisturbed for ages, evil resides in a towering fortress... A young wanderer, without a name and past, has been forced to travel to this fortress by a shadowy spirit who controls his every move. Setting out on an uncertain journey, the nameless wanderer has no choice but to succeed in pleasing the spirit's wishes or die trying...

name: Greatest Dynasties Mahjong
summary: The greatest dynasties played this game! From emperors to common people honed their minds through this game. And who knows, maybe that was the key to their success?!

name: Granny in Paradise
summary: Granny in Paradise is the second game in the Super Granny series.

name: Grand Prix Circuit
summary: This port features different graphics due to hardware limitations and no music.

name: Gravity Golfing
summary:
Infinite golfing in a universe where gravity changes when your ball hits a wall.

Gravity golfing is a casual golfing game. Hit a wall to change gravity and shoot your ball in the hole.

name: Greg LeMond's Bicycle Adventure
summary:
To cycling enthusiasts everywhere!

Prepare to go on the bike ride of all time.
These diskettes contain a Knowledge Adventure Interactive Book produced by Eden Interactive. You may have seen something a bit like it on CD-ROM. But you've never seen as many pictures, as much video and sound, as much action, that work off your hard drive. It's only possible because of what one of Knowledge Adventure's programmers calls a "truly excellent compression algorithm," which they invented and have a patent pending.

Open this Interactive Book and suddenly you're on a tour of cycling. With a click of your mouse (or cursor keys) you create your own journey through space and time. There are many guide posts but no road map. You're as free with this program as you are on your bike. Go wherever you choose, and change your path each time!

And remember to always have fun and get pedaling.

name: Group Project Simulator
summary: In a group project with a colorful cast of characters, Yu must try to get that A. Fail at scheduling group meetings, stop group members from procrastinating, and maybe adopt a cat.

name: Green Run
summary: Green Run is free 3d endless runner game which has interesting features like Shop and two player mode

name: Graffiti Simulator
summary: Become a great graffiti artist and work your way to success! Have you always wanted to learn how to paint graffiti? Now you can do it in our Graffiti Simulator.

name: Green
summary:
The sequel to my 'yellow', 'red', 'black' and 'blue' games is here!
Can you make the screen green in 50 levels?
Each level has its own logic.

Do you need help? Use the light bulb button that will appear after a while in the top right of each level to get a hint.
There are multiple hints for each level.
With the premium unlock in-app you will not get ads before the hints.

A Bart Bonte / bontegames puzzle game.

name: Grounded Sim
summary: In this comical adventure, you embody Giles Outlandish, who drunkenly stumbles into a portal, mistaking it for an exit from a bar. Now trapped in Kayloo's Games, you must conquer diverse levels of various game genres to escape. However, the key to success lies in entertaining the mischievous creatures and avoiding the wrath of the monsters. With simple humor and clever thinking, players must navigate this whimsical realm to find a way back home before they become trapped forever.

name: Greed and Grind
summary: Hello guys I am bringing you this time around a small cozy little game about greed and grinding!! If you played my prevous games you should know what to expect! If you didnt... This is a small Idle game where the character battles autommatically while everything you do is drink a coffee.

name: Grid Runner
summary: VR ONLY. Drive your flying car at 500 MPH, weaving through traffic and avoiding the police. Enjoy the atmospheres of rainy, future noir nights and sunny, cab-driving days as you cruise to an original synthwave soundtrack or your own custom playlist. It's time to fly.

name: Growth
summary: Journey to a place where even DEATH doesn’t stop your GROWTH…

name: Gravity Cat
summary: You'll need all nine lives to survive this treacherous platformer. Enemies include rabid rodents, angry bees, and a fire-breathing dragon. Will you reach the key before the troll takes its toll?

name: Grapples Galore: Cosmetics Pack 1
summary: This bundle contains 7 very stylish hats and 3 (also very stylish) outfits for Grapples Galore. You Must Own Grapples Galore

name: Grove Island
summary:
Trapped on a small island, you are being stalked by multiple entities but you must keep your light sources alight while you try to search the island for anything useful...
Keep your campfire and torch lit, if both go out, who knows what may be bold enough to come for you. Search the Island to collect relics but be wary of those who are watching from the shadows.

name: Grave of Träumerei
summary: Tsutsuji and Sumire meet at an unpopular subway station. For some reason, the train never seems to stop. Together, they search for clues to escape.

name: Grim Tales: Horizon of Wishes
summary: What is Richard up to? Pursue Anna's missing father through time!

name: Grave Desecrator
summary: new in town ready to work in this society that you dont belong, start working as a cemetery watchman discover the tradition of this place, carry yours , learn about the dead ones,experiance emotions that you thought you werent capable...

name: Graphwar
summary: Graphwar is an artillery game in which you must hit your enemies using mathematical functions. The trajectory of your shot is determined by the function you wrote, and your goal is to avoid the obstacles and your teammates and hit your enemies. The game takes place in a Cartesian Plane.

name: Greed Realm: Hero from Another World & the Soul Tree
summary: This is an RPG strategy adventure game that incorporates tabletop game elements and uses card construction as the main gameplay.

name: Gridtrap
summary: You have to move along a grid and defuse bombs before their timer runs out.

name: Green the Planet 2
summary:
What is Green Style, you may ask?
It is greening one planet after another by traveling through the universe and changing it to be a comfortable place to live.
