Therefore, you will feel more relaxed, refreshed, and satisfied with your accomplishments: your green planets.

name: GraphSpacer Black
summary: GraphSpacer Black is an XNA community game

name: Gremlins
summary:
The Atari 2600 adaption of the 1984 film, "Gremlins".

In this version, on the first screen, Mogwai are jumping from the roof to get at hamburgers on the ground. You, as Billy, must catch them before the hit they ground. If you get them all, it is off to the next, faster, level. If you miss eight, then you go to a shooting screen.

On the shooting screen, gremlins are approaching from the distance. You must shoot them before they reach you. If one reaches you, you lose a life. After they are all dead, it is back to the first screen at a faster level. In later levels, puddles of water will divide the gremlins in two.

A different version of the same name was also released for the 5200, Commodore 64 and Apple II.

name: Grey Galactic
summary: Grey Galactic is a real time strategy game in space where you build up your planets and ships to conquer your enemies. Develop your planets and fleet of spaceships to destroy your enemies and take over the galaxy! Do you have what it takes to become the best Fleet Captain the UFMC has ever seen?

name: Green Mountain
summary: Climb the green mountain trail

name: Granado Espada M
summary: It is a mobile adaptation of the older Granado Espada.

name: Grand Theft Auto 64
summary: Grand Theft Auto 64 is an unreleased port of Grand Theft Auto for the Nintendo 64 which was cancelled before being revealed to the public.

name: Grim Tales: Threads of Destiny
summary: Grim Tales: Threads of Destiny is the the 9th installment of Grim Tales Series by Elephant Games.

name: Grapple!
summary: Grapple! is a parkour game built for speedrunning. You're tasked to reach the end of the level only with the aid of a grappling hook & glider.

name: Grimoire: Manastorm - Fire Class
summary: Fire is designed to be the easiest class to play well but it can also be one of the hardest to master. At its core, the class is an area-of-effect damage dealer. This makes it great for controlling large areas and supporting a battle with consistent high damage.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!!!: Hit Song + VTuber Pack 6
Groove Heaven
summary: Rhymi has to deliver a love letter to a beautiful angel, only she is a little demon and the letter is from the Devil lord himself.

name: Grave Filler
summary: A graveyard themed, suika style puzzle game.

name: Grimistar: Once more with feeling
summary: Grimistar has returned! Can you defeat him in this game jam sequel?

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Collector's Edition
summary:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Collector's Edition Content:
• Collector’s Edition Box
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Starter Item Pack
• Character Color Pack 1, 2, and 3
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Special Artbook
• Special Soundtrack CD
• Postcard Set
• Metal Charm: Sword of Eos
• Proto Bahamut Statue Figure

name: Greed and Fear and the Rest
summary: You are ready to say goodbye to life, but are you prepared to face your life's truth? Navigate a grad student's life between greed and fear in his final 6 hours (and beyond) in this BL visual novel.

name: Grenade Madness
summary: Grenade Madness is a crazy round-based multiplayer shooter with lots of explosions. Start your room, customize your loadout and challenge your friends now!

name: Grow Light
summary: A short game about a botanist banished to the moon for attempting to create sentient plant life. They move through the sections of their circular lunar base, talking to plants, drinking tea, reading old personal logs, and meditating on rejection and isolation.

name: Gravitee 2
summary: Gravitee is back! Play through 40 levels of Interstellar Golf. Gravitee 2 features 4 different game play types and 90 awards to win.

name: Graffiti Kingdom
summary: Graffiti Kingdom is the sequel to Magic Pengel, an action adventure game developed by Taito. In the game, you play as a prince who must use his magic wand to save his parents and his home. Use the in-game drawing tools to transform your character into three different creatures at anytime, turn 2D shapes into 3D objects, and pull off a variety of special attacks

name: Grabity
summary: Dance the tango of death in Grabity, a fast-paced, physics-based arena brawler. Combat robots duke it out using Grab guns to turn nearby objects into lethal projectiles or makeshift shields in intense tactical throw-downs.

name: Grandpa's Cheese
summary: Grandpa has gone mad! collect the cheese and give them to Reeze so he can feed his mouse to get the hell out of the house!

name: Grim Prix
summary: Grim Prix is a multiplayer vertical race where paladins compete from point A to point B in a given racing track in a frenetic melee combat against other players and enemies (NPCs) in a quest for gems to achieve Divine Enlightenment at the finish line by using multiple gadgets and tricks.

name: Grimm's Godfather
summary: A game written by WaffleShuai for the 21st Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Grezzodue 2
summary: Grezzodue 2 is an audacious blend of FPS, immersive sim and satirical horror, steeped in a rich, provocative atmosphere. Featuring one of the most expansive open-worlds based on Perugia, Italy, it promises an epic, nonlinear story with multiple outcomes. With its unique combination of ultra-violence, Italian humor, and biting social commentary, Grezzodue 2 stands for audacity, controversy, and unforgettable gaming.

name: Greedy in the Dark
summary: Greedy in the dark is a slow-paced platformer game with Metroidvania elements. You venture into the dark caves under the abandoned factory to loot stuff, obviously you didn't take any equipment for moving in the dark (it's pricy nowadays), you 100% sure there will be something useful on your path.

name: Grime: Tinge of Terror
summary: Enjoy a New Game + mode featuring revamped enemies and bosses, endless progression, and a terrifying secret boss!

name: Grave Prosperity: Redux- part 1
summary: Grave Prosperity: Redux follows Amber Ridge as she finds herself broken down on a mountain road. Without any reception and no signs of passers-by, she is forced to walk to the nearest town- Prosperity. A place that knows no God and exists only to make you suffer. Utilize a deadly arsenal of agility, blade-work and gun-play to fend off the darkness that stalks your every movement. Collect EXP through solving puzzles and slaying grotesque creatures in order to upgrade your stats to better suit you survival needs.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - The Day of the Olifant
summary: Military clash between Angolans and SADF during Bush War in 1987. Joint attack of two SADF battlegroups on the strong point of the Angolan army near the highway on Cuito-Cuanavale.

name: Gridmaster
summary: Step into the world of Gridmaster, a high-speed single-player racer. Take on time trials, master the art of drifting, and compete on the leaderboards. As you dominate the road, unlock new cars and tracks to fuel your journey to victory!

name: Grinsia
summary: A traditional Japanese RPG from Kemco, originally released on iOS and Android devices, later brought to PC and Nintendo 3DS by Nicalis.

name: Gran Trak 10
summary: Gran Trak 10 was a single-player racing arcade game released by Atari in 1974. The player raced against the clock, accumulating as many points as possible. Primitive diode-based ROM was used to store the sprites for the car, score and game timer, and the race track. The game's controls — steering wheel, four-position gear shifter, and accelerator and brake foot pedals — were also all firsts for arcade games.

name: Growth
summary: Growth is, fundamentally a game about hope. It's also a game about abuse, and recovery from it. It's a game about being autistic and queer in a less than stellar environment.

name: GridRoad
summary: GridRoad is a traffic optimisation simulation game. Build roads, place roadsigns and tweak traffic lights to build the most efficient traffic junction!

name: Greed
summary: Explore the unforgiving world of Ükeron, reveal the story of its kings and warlords, carve your path through its dangerous environments, outlive your foes and grow more powerful with each strike of your sword.

name: Grit & Gold
summary: Step into Grit & Gold, shaping your fate amidst the chaos of the California Gold Rush. Build a town from scratch, attracting settlers with diverse buildings. But beware of outlaws aiming to seize your treasures! Can you thrive in the lawless Wild West? Build. Plan. Conquer.

name: Grid Start
summary: Formula 1 racing game for Amiga, similar to Pole Position.

name: Grooming Adventure
summary: You have to be a cat and visit your master. Various obstacles will haunt you. If you walk past the obstacle toward the can, you can meet your owner. You must free the hidden mode.

name: Great Hopes City I
summary: Great Hopes City is a 2D retro-style RPG in pixel Ukraine of the 1990s. Take control over old friends: Cudgel and Ratsy. Explore the city, fight with opponents, talk to odd citizens, and upgrade your character during a powerful story!

name: Grim Tales: The Generous Gift - Collector's Edition
summary: A mysterious birthday gift uncovers a sinister kidnapping plot!

name: GraFi 3
summary: GraFi 3 - casual, colorful,minimalist, physical puzzle with traps and changing gravity.

name: Grab and Guts
summary: Grab and Guts - Shooter about JuraPis' journey through the human body, microscopic world, and unimaginable liquids and corners of light. Use your grappling hook to navigate, gather weapons, and eliminate parasitic enemies.

name: Grand Rush VR: Highway Car Traffic Racing Simulator
Gran Duel: Shinki Dungeon no Hihou
summary: Gran Duel: Shinki Dungeon no Hihou is a Role-Playing game, developed by Studio VeX and published by Bottom Up, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Gran Turismo 2000
summary: Gran Turismo 2000 is the original title of the project that became Gran Turismo 3: A-Spec, with the name being used for several demonstration builds and one demo disc. It was based on Gran Turismo 2, where the physics and graphics were updated to showcase what Polyphony Digital could do with the new hardware in the PlayStation 2.

name: Grackon's Curse
summary: The evil wizard Grackon has casted a Spell of Deadly Silence on Castle Crondiff, which has caused that all in the castle have vanished. However, his plans to prevent the King from having a heir have failed. For the good wizard Troda has intervened and saved Atamus, the young prince. You are that young prince, and you have returned to the castle to try to lift the curse. The doors are closed behind you. If you fail, the place will be doomed forever. Grackon's curse is a 1st person point and click adventure that plays in a 3D environment. All actions take place within the castle. The action window covers about 1/3 of the screen when the player simply walks through the corridors and rooms of the castle, but the close-ups are a bit bigger. At each stopping point the player can pan around at 90 degrees intervals. While examining some places/objects, the player will hear voices of the persons that have disappeared (not captioned). The game has six saving slots. The player can die in the game.

name: Great Sluggers '94
summary: Baseball arcade game that had been released by Namco in June 1994; it runs on the company's NB-1 hardware, and as the name suggests, it is the sequel to Great Sluggers (which was released exclusively in Japan the year before). However, instead of the twelve teams of Japan's Central and Pacific Leagues, the players must take control of two of the twenty-eight teams of the American League and National League - and there are two teams for both Chicago and New York.

name: Gritz: The Pyramid Adventure
summary: Gritz - The Pyramid Adventure story is about 4 adventurers from different parts of the world (Mexico, England, Isreal & Zaire) that travels on an adventure to Egypt to reveal the secrets and treasures of the pyramids.

name: Grand Tour
summary: A puzzle game similar to Tetris.

name: Graffiti Eraser
summary: Available through the Pokémon Global Link website, Graffiti Eraser is a simple game in which the player wipes graffiti from a store window in order to reveal three Pokémon dolls. While most dolls are given a random point value, dolls of legendary Pokémon have a fixed value of 50 points. Upon revealing three dolls, the game ends, and the player will be given their score and will receive a random item or set of items that can be sent back to the player's 3DS Pokémon RPG.

name: Green Wounds
summary: Craft, manage resources, fight enemies, and explore the unknown in this medieval RPG.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 9
Grim Tales: The Legacy
summary: Grim Tales: The Legacy is a hidden object game where you explore a deserted estate and avoid dangerous beasts. Use your hidden object talents to track down your sister's family and save them in Grim Tales: The Legacy!

name: Grim Tales 8: The Final Suspect
summary: Ms. Gray, an unrivaled detective with ability to go to the past, is in danger. They find a corpse in her house. She doesn't remember the preceding events and has no idea who the murderer is. She is the prime suspect. Go back in time and find out who is the murderer in Grim Tales: The Final Suspect.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Undertale + Deltarune Pack
Great Bishi Bashi Champ
summary: A game that features 142 mini-games that are generated at random when you choose between modes. It has an interactive difficulty system, in which the difficulty changes depending on how many games you passed/failed in a row. Because of that, the difficulty between stages becomes increasingly more challenging. Each stage ends with a "boss battle". After the game, a score table will show up, comparing your score to the target score. If it matches, or is better than the target score, you will get rise in rank, which is shown at the bottom of the screen, and will not lose a life. If it is worse, a crowd booing sound will be heard, and you will lose a life.

name: Greatest Dungeon
summary: Soulslike PvPvE medieval Dungeon-crawler, with extraction possibility and incoming zone. The Combat is Physicbased and has dismemberment, higher speed-stats of yours slowdown enemy's, and projectiles, you can find rare Items or NPCs in the Dungeon that give you Quests or fight Bosses.

name: Grovesong
summary: Explore the still and calming Grove. Draw music in the air. Each note has it's distinct colour and sound. Make your own calming songs by mixing the Colours and Sound of the Grove.

name: Grudge Murder: Flight
summary: Grudge Murder - Flight is a time-loop horror game set on an airplane.

name: Greedy Dungeons
summary: Who needs swords and spells when you have cash? Run through the dungeon with your defenseless hero, and collect as much gold as you can possibly carry! How much loot can you get away with ?

name: Gradius
summary: The PC-Engine port of Gradius

name: Gratuitous Zombie Cannon
summary: A dual stage survival FPS/Defense/strategy zombie game; a DSSFPSSZG you could say...¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Stage 1 (Birds-eye-view strategy): Place defense mechanisms such as turrets, mines, etc around you. Stage 2 (FPS): Shoot incendiary rounds at the zombies from your powerful cannon!

name: Grim Tides
summary: A traditional RPG adventure, set in a detailed fantasy world with abundance of writen lore. Inspired by the classics of the genre, it tries to evoke both the simplicity and complexity associated with early RPG games, and can be played in short bursts of just a few minutes, or for hours at a time.

name: Grave Apologies
summary: Fauvist Musical Graveyard / Walking Simulator / Soft Chamber

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Additional Character: Beatrix
summary: Set Contents: • Playable character: Beatrix • Premium Avatar: Beatrix • Badge: Beatrix • Weapon Cutout: Embrasque Sword • Figure Studio poses 1-6 and expressions 1-7 for Beatrix

name: Grey Haven
summary: Grey Haven is a game where you explore Nightmare and build a village with the girls you saved. Explore the Nightmare with the help of the witch, help the girls and gather resources to build your haven.

name: Grand Fantasia
summary: A free MMORPG from Aeria Games.

name: Grand National
summary:
Officially licensed game of the world's most famous steeplechase event of the same name, which is run annually at Aintree Racecourse, Liverpool UK and was sponsored by Seagram in 1990.

The goal is to win a race with your chosen horse at Aintree Racecourse while also having a bet on the outcome.

name: Grand Master
summary: Featuring a Western fantasy theme, Grand Master is an action RPG developed by Soft Machine and Published by Varie with a story told through multiple story branches the player can discover.

name: Group S Challenge
summary: Group S Challenge is a racing game published by Capcom.

name: Grim Swarm
summary: In 20 seconds the infinite swarm of the undead will arrive and there is nothing you can do about it, so collect all your weapons and take down as many zombies as you can to the grave! See how high of a high score you can get to unlock all weapons and hats Inspired by an old flash game called De-animator, check it out if you can!

name: Gravitational Phenomenon
summary: IN THIS 3D ARCADE PLATFORMER GAME AN UNKNOWN CATACLYSM HAS ROCKED THE EARTH THE LAWS OF PHYSICS NO LONGER APPLY YOU MUST DESCEND THROUGH THE WRECKAGE Back to the OLD WORLD, TO EARTH

name: Gradius II
summary: A remaster of Gradius: The Interstellar Assault.

name: Gretchen: Queen of Crows
summary: Gretchen: Queen of Crows is a 2D Action/Adventure that follows Gretchen and Baldrek the crow. Use Gretchen's gift of fire, and Baldrek's magic abilities to jump, glide, dash, and battle through beautifully twisted and fairy-tale-like fantasy environments full of demonic folk-lore inspired creatures.

name: Greedy Snake
summary: Snake escape from Garden of Eden

name: Grandpa: The Horror Game
summary: Grandpa is a survival horror game.

name: Graveskelet
summary: In a deep and dark forest, skeletons rise up and you pick up your gun and start hunting them down to stop it.

name: Gravity Bot
summary: In this Sci-Fi Physics-Based Puzzle Game, you control a little robot with a big power. Use your power of changing gravity to stop the space pirates and return all the stolen goods to their owners.

name: Gran Turismo 5: Academy Edition
summary:
The definitive release of Gran Turismo 5, GT5: Academy Edition features special updates, extra cars, additional courses and exciting new features.

Includes:
- The base game
- Complete Pack (new cars, courses and paint schemes)
- Car Pack 2 (4 new cars)
- Car Pack 3 (6 new cars)
- Speed Test Pack (new tests for the car setups)
- Nissan GT-R N24 GT Academy ’12

name: Grime II
summary: Become the stealer of forms in GRIME II, a surreal action-adventure metroidvania. launch tendrils made of hands to absorb foes and summon molds in their shape, as you explore a bizarre lived-in-world obsessed with art.

name: Grim Tales: The Bride - Collector's Edition
summary: After your sister vanishes on her wedding day no one has any idea what happened to her, so it’s up to you to find the truth!

name: Gradius
summary: A remaster of the game previously released as Nemesis.

name: Grand Poo World III
summary: Grand Poo World III is the third and final romhack in Barbarian's Grand Poo World series. The game is a continuation of Grand Poo World II, which is a Super Mario World romhack dedicated to Twitch streamer and YouTuber GrandPooBear.

name: Grejsimojs
summary: An anachronistic 90s-style Episode 2 Replacement.

name: GreenFlame
summary: BlueFlame has brought never-ending Winter to the land. Use your custom GreenFlame and awesome powers to Bring Back Spring! #GFBBS

name: Great Race: Route 66
summary:
Cruise across America on the famous Route 66, all the way from lush Illinois to the shores of California!
Choose your favourite Classic Car from a vintage collection and beat the competition, but remember to stop every now and then to enjoy the attractions along the way.

name: Grim Earth
summary: The Earth's looking a bit Grim, but so would you after 5000 years and countless alien invasions! Grab your spacesuit (the air's not so great any more) and go for an adventure in what is still a beautiful world.

name: Greymen: A Post-Apocalyptic Band Reunion
summary: A unique blend of exploration and strategy. Travel in a handcrafted wasteland and fight mutants underground.

name: Gravity Rider
summary:
Tackle moto racing trials, defeat your racing rivals, finish in record time and get on the road to becoming a bike rider champion. Select a motocross bike for extreme motorcycle racing, a race car if you're in the mood for extreme car driving or even an ATV road bike. 
 
Race to the finish at turbo fast speed, but watch out – moto jumps, zero gravity fields, asphalt elevators & drift tracks will challenge you! Play to keep your space bike steady and don’t turn into a skiddy car in this road bike balance skill game. 
 
Leverage the power of the realistic motorcycle racing engine: free fall along blocks to build bridges, balance on extreme asphalt ramps and flip jump over traps and trials to defeat other riders. 
 
Compete in turbo fast trials against 3 of your rider rivals. Play on the asphalt - dominate the leaderboards and drift your light bike to the extreme top of the space racing league.

name: Gravity
summary: Two levels for any limit removing port. PrBoom-Plus with gamma 1 or GZDoom are recommended.

name: Grunder
summary: Grunder is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You will have to go through a series of dangerous locations, each of which presents a new test and challenge for your skills. On your journey you will encounter treacherous enemies. Use your fighting skills to overcome your challenge!

name: Grimrain
summary: Grimrain is a fantasy MMO set in a world where the player starts as an lowly villager rescued by a helpful ranger, who sets out to explore who they are, why they find themselves in a realm slowly turning itself inside out, and the machinations that once helped ensure balance is maintained.

name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger 5.5
summary: Faced with the biggest decision of her life, what world will Arisaka choose to live in? Here comes Volume 5.5 of the Grisaia Phantom Trigger series!

name: GraveRun
summary: Old school pixel-art scroll-shooter with tons of enemies in one screen, non-linear upgrade of dozens of weapons, hot seat play, modifications and sharing of your scores.

name: Grim-World: Survival
summary: Grim World is a survival and adventure game in which you can build your home, create your character and shape it to your liking . You can become a warrior, a hunter or even a magician. You may well be halfway between a hunter and a magic like you want

name: Grand Strokers
summary: Comedic Horror RPG / JRPG that will leave you breathless with a sticky keyboard --- or offended! No holds barred, no filters. Pure unadulterated sexiness monster orgy goodness!! Features color tiers gear, a ton of monsters and enemies, multiple dungeons and even bosses you can recruit as characters!!

name: Gravity Fighters
summary: Physics-based space battles for 1-4 players. Harness the power of gravity!

name: Grand Knights History
summary: Grand Knights History is a set in the fantasy world of Rystia, which is divided into three warring kingdoms: Logres, the Ancient Kingdom, ruled by King Fausel; Union, the Kingdom of Knights, ruled by King Leon; and Avalon, the Kingdom of Magic, ruled by Queen Muse. Players must align themselves to one of the three nations and advance the story by taking part in missions on behalf of their chosen country.

name: Grim Facade: The Artist and The Pretender - Collector's Edition
summary: Leonardo da Vinci needs your help! A tyrant has conquered Florence and he is destroying all works of art and science!

name: Gravity Vector
summary: Gravity Vector is a challenging game where the player's main objective is to reach a target wormhole aboard a capsule, while facing different obstacles such as planets' gravitational pull, hostile entities, asteroids and more.

name: Growing Pains
summary: Growing pains is a fast and furious platformer which gives the genre a shake up with sleek graphics, a thumping soundtrack and an ingenious twist that you’ve never seen before. The "Vessel" which you control continually grows and expands leaving you in a permanent race to clear the area and escape before you get too big and find your butt wedged in a tight spot. Combine this with tight controls and levels crammed with devious traps and you've got a heart-pounding race guaranteed to leave you with sweaty palms and a sense of overwhelming satisfaction when you reach the goal.

name: Gravity Express
summary:
In Gravity Express, you battle gravity while transporting cargo through abandoned mines.

Clients will demand speedy delivery, fuel economy, and won't be paying for your funeral. You better find your way fast while avoiding the rocky walls, magnets and cannons that spell your doom.

name: Ground Divers
summary: In Ground Divers has players guiding the rabbit-like mining robot Tsuruhashi into increasingly complex mine shafts of their own creation. They'll be digging for "rare" matter as well as battling underground enemies, building Pit Relay Systems to help offer upgrades and supporting units along the way, and more.

name: Grow: Wild West
summary: Grow: Wild West is an interactive cartoon, that tells us about events occuring in a small town in wild west. Become a mayor and lead the development of the town and follow the story in the best traditions of a spaghetti-westerns of the last century. Fates of the residents of a small provincial town depend on your specific decisions...

name: Great Ice Hockey
summary: Welcome to the Big Leagues. Here's a rough and tumble hockey game that takes a steady hand and quick reflexes. Because your mean opponents mean business. Teams line up in full defense. Tackle one another. Scramble for the puck. Drive relentlessly for a goal. Victory for your team depends on you. So you need sharp techniques. Quickness. Power. And smooth stick-shifting ability. Show you have the right touch, hit the puck straight into the goal. But just relax your guard, and see why they call the game of hockey "wrestling on ice."

name: Green: An Orc's Life
summary: A Reigns-like card-swiper. Grow an orc. Pilot it through a life of pillage, plunder and gluttony. Build up your horde, become filthy-rich with loot, even become a god! Planned for release- early 2020 for Steam and mobile.

name: Green Day: Dookie - Welcome to Paradise
summary: A fully playable, demastered version of “Welcome To Paradise” on Game Boy made in collaboration with the band Green Day and the Californian art studio BRAIN, which will immerse you in the world of a small apartment in Oakland, California. Search out the record to play the full 8-bit rendition of your favorite song. Listen till your thumbs are sore then play again.

name: Grim Tales: The Wishes
summary: When her young son begins to wither and age before her eyes, your sister desperately requests your help. You must set things right before your nephew pays the terrible price!

name: Grand Theft Auto: London Special Edition
summary: The Special Edition of GTA London is a standalone version of Grand Theft Auto: Mission Pack #1 - London 1969 and as a result does not need a copy of the original Grand Theft Auto. It also comes with a GTA London poster.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas VR
summary: Experience the story of Carl "CJ" Johnson (in VR), a man who is framed by a couple of cops for homicide and is forced on a journey that takes him across the entire state of San Andreas, to save his family and to take control of the streets.

name: Graphs
summary: A daily guessing game, where players are presented with a graph visualization of a mystery data set and must guess what the information the data set represents.

name: Ground-Unbound
summary: Ground-Unbound is a procedurally generated, high-intensity movement shooter with a retro wave art style. It features roguelike mechanics with a number of skills, guns and abilities to play with, including a variety of enemy types. Created during the 7-Day BigFry Game Jam, updated for steam release.

name: Grand Pskov Story
summary: This is a story about one case of an extremely unconventional medicine of the Russian outback.

name: G-Rebels
summary: G-Rebels: An action-packed combat flight sim in a dystopian open world full of intrigue, free exploration and dangerous missions. As part of an elite unit, it is your job to ensure law and order. A secret mission calls everything into question: are you on the right side or part of a conspiracy?

name: Grav1ty
summary: Discover an enigmatic universe. Explore diverse biomes, face ancient guardians, and uncover hidden secrets in this captivating 2D pixel art platformer. Embark on an unforgettable cosmic odyssey!

name: GravBlocks
summary: The abduction has begun! Can you meet the challenge or will you fall to these alien jerks?

name: Grind Stormer
summary: "Grind Stormer" is a 1993 vertically scrolling shooter arcade video game originally developed and published by Toaplan in Japan and North America. It is considered to be the spiritual successor to Slap Fight. Based around a video game within a video game concept, players assume the role of a young secret agent assigned by the government taking control of the NA-00 space fighter craft in an attempt to defeat the titular virtual reality simulator, rescue the abducted players who lost against it and unveil its true purpose.

name: Gremlins Gizmo
summary:
Unleash Gizmo's fun-loving personality! Explore rooms, play games, dress up in costumes and unlock new things!

In Gremlins Gizmo, players can interact with and care for their very own pet mogwai. Choose Gizmo or one of his four cuddly friends and unleash their fun-loving personalities through nurturing interactions, exploration and discovery. Play dozens of games including retro style arcade games, music games, and hide and seek. Watch Gizmo sing and dance his way to new levels and earn trophies to unlock new costumes, new environments and additional mini and micro games.

name: Grokit: Winter Blast
summary: Get into the festive holiday spirit in this Grokit trailer, showcasing what you can expect with the latest update for the mixed reality social multiplayer hand-tracking party game.

name: Gravity
summary: A great retro-2D platform adventure trying to stop a global alien computer virus infection.

name: Gradius II
summary: The Famicom port of Gradius II.

name: Gravity Falls: PinesQuest
summary: Dipper and Mabel are trapped into an 8bit world in PinesQuest Game. Help them escape by solving all the quests in the game and defeat the boss!

name: Grappling Hook and Grappling Hook
summary: This is a physics based VR game about grappling hook. Use your two grappling guns to attach to walls using special ropes. Not only can you swing, but also pull forward, allowing some complex maneuver between buildings within 3D space. Join Discrod or QQ 278367233 group!

name: Grid 32
summary: MegaWad is consisting of 6 levels, which were built in "grid 32". This map editor grid was used while making all of these levels. All vertexes lay on knots of a grid 32, and this rule does not extend on things.There is no general style, each map expresses individual style of it`s author.

name: Gray Space
summary: This is a world of justice and evil struggle, good and evil two sides sent each other undercover, through a battle of wits to obtain the intelligence of the other side, the eradication of the other side undercover, victory.

name: Gradius Galaxies
summary: Gradius Galaxies is a horizontally-scrolling shooter handheld video game released for the Game Boy Advance. This is the only Gradius title available for the system.

name: Greed Series
summary: Discover mysterious secrets and attempted sabotage in the Greed Series bundle!

name: Grim Tales: Horizon of Wishes - Collector's Edition
summary: What is Richard up to? Pursue Anna’s missing father through time!
